reviews.review_msg: Garfinkel is second to none. His Italian film/history seminar was far and away the best class I've taken at SFU. Discussions are lively and funny. He gives better and more extensive feedback than any prof I've had. His marking is very fair, and he makes extra time for you if you need writing help. I definitely recommend the Professore.

I agree with previous people who wrote that the Italian Films, Italian Histories seminar was the best history class they've taken. You will work hard, and yuo'll discuss excellent films every week. You're expected to participate, write and think at a high level, so if you're afraid to talk, or if your writing stinks, then avoid.
